Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "This function is used to get quick reference help for a specific merry function. You may also use +mhelp to add new/modify/remove existing references.\\r\\n\\r\\nNote: The MHelp references are read-only and will be overwritten on any other server than the master (currently the Marrach server)."

"+mhelp list\\r\\n Bring up a complete list of available references.\\r\\n\\r\\n+mhelp EmitTo\\r\\n Bring up helpfile on the Merry function EmitTo().\\r\\n\\r\\n+mhelp \\"+EmitTo\\" \\r\\n Edit the MHelp reference for EmitTo().\\r\\n\\r\\n+mhelp \\"-foo\\"\\r\\n Remove the MHelp reference for foo()."
